Nighlight::

Th cr opened the door, showing Nighlight who seemed sleep. She was 
calmed down and her movements were slow


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Obfucious::
>     As he was staring at the tool kit he remembered what he came 
for.  He 
> opened the kit and took out a screwdriver, a wrench, and some small 
spare 
> parts (screws, bolts, etc.)  He proceeds to open a storage 
compartment in his 
> left arm.  When it is open he finds he already has those things 
built in.  He 
> tosses the ones from the tool kit over his shoulder.  He also finds 
a pair of 
> goggles that serve to both protect his optics and scan for tiny 
breaks in the 
> connection.  He looks at his right arm and finds a small soldering 
iron built 
> in.  He stands up and walks back to the bridge.  He puts the 
goggles on and 
> inspects the panel again.  He finds many minute breaks which he 
repairs 
> quickly.  Might as well fix the parts before he gets power back up.
> 
>     He begins tracing the connection back to the generator.  He 
finally finds 
> the break and repairs it.  As he does this the ship comes back to 
life.  His 
> job done he looses focus and stares into space.
> 
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He hears a noise inside the ship and sees light inside the 
base.  He runs 
> in after seeing Nightlight's wounds.  He goes down the hall to the 
med lab.  
> He gently places Nightlight into the CR chamber he had brought from 
Perplex's 
> ship.  He then sits down to wait.
